item.title: Kumail Nanjiani, Michael Urie to Join ‘Oh, Mary!’ on Broadway
item.description: Kumail Nanjiani, Michael Urie and Jenn Harris will join the Broadway company of “Oh, Mary” as Mary’s Husband (if you know, you know), Mary’s Teacher and Mary’s Chaperone,
